com.team30.game.game_mechanics

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team30.game.game_mechanics.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Auber, Infiltrator, Npc, StationSystem

    public class Entity
extends Object
    Handles updating position and collision detection
